Description: Geoadministrative boundarie level 1. In the case of Chile, the level is Region.
Geoadministrative boundarie level 3. In the case of Chile, the level is 'comuna', and it is equivalent to a city or municipality.
An abbreviation of city and the respective region it belongs to.
Code to individualize cities, provided by GeoQuery.
Number of registered firms with sales by city expressed in log.
Annual sales of micro, small and medium firms by city in UF expressed in log
Total number of people employed by micro and small enterprises by city.
Ranking of number of firms by city.
Rank of employment provided by sales of micro and small companies by city.
Ranking of Sercotec subsidies by city.
Ranking of BDD subsidies by city.
Ranking of ADD subsidies by city.
